cx.corp.lacuna.core.windows

Interface ProcessOpener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WindowsProcessOpener
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface ProcessOpener
    Provides functionality for opening a handle to a native process.
    See Also:
    ProcessDescriptionGetter, ProcessOwnerGetter, ProcessHandle

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ProcessHandle open(int pid, int processAccessFlags)
      Opens a handle to the native process.

    • Method Detail

      • open

        ProcessHandle open(int pid,
                   int processAccessFlags)
            throws ProcessOpenException
        Opens a handle to the native process.
        Parameters:
        pid - The process identifier of the native process.
        processAccessFlags - The ProcessAccessFlags used to specify requested access rights.
        Returns:
        A handle to the native process.
        Throws:
        ProcessOpenException - if opening a handle failed, for example due to insufficient privileges.
